problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains integer n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers (-10000 <= a_i <= 10000).
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - the maximum sum of contiguous subarray.

problems.title: Rotate Array
problems.description: Given an array, rotate the array to the right by k steps, where k is non-negative.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= n <= 100000, 0 <= k <= 1000000000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - the rotated array.

problems.title: Find Missing Number
problems.description: Given an array nums containing n distinct numbers in the range [0, n], return the only number in the range that is missing from the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains integer n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - the missing number.
